entities.name: Scrimgeour
entities.description: The Minister who is questioning Harry, Ron, and Hermione. He is described as giving a cold, appraising look to Harry.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: One of the three students being questioned by Scrimgeour. He is described as speaking up against Scrimgeour's plan to question them individually.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of the three students being questioned by Scrimgeour. He is described as not aware that Dumbledore had left him anything in his will.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: One of the three students being questioned by Scrimgeour. She is described as nodding vigorously against Scrimgeour's plan to question them individually.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour is questioning Harry, as evident from the conversation where Scrimgeour asks Harry questions.
Scrimgeour is also questioning Ron, as mentioned in the text where Scrimgeour points at Ron and says 'I will start with Ronald'.
Scrimgeour is questioning Hermione, as evident from the conversation where Scrimgeour asks her questions.
